title: NullOS DEMO (Submission for the International College Jam #6)
description: This is a early demo of a game jam project created by us, more specifically for the International college jam #6 which carried the main theme of Cozy cyberpunk

title: Inclination (Taitaja9 Demo project)
description: A 2D retro climbing game with survival elements and a planned local co-op implementation. Further, it serves as the base of the Taitaja-9 Demo.
